text: [Music]
i'm glad to be here today at the xr
stage where this whole show has been put
together in a virtual way used to be the
way of the future now is the way of
today i can't get enough of this
technology it's the human magic that
happens around a virtual set it's fun
because it's not a bunch of green
screens it's not a bunch of elements
that are going to be put together later
it's all put together at the same time
in real time and i think that's what
makes it more magic than just being on a
normal set it's amazing right yeah it's
really cool and i walked into this room
and my mind was like
you hear about oh virtual production you
hear about the led screens but to
actually like see it and participate in
the seagraph event in the keynote and
actually experience it i'm definitely
sold as this is the future yeah i can't
wait to see the finished product and
then the geek in me wants to go and
figure out how this is all working i
need a virtual production room for my
everyday social media opportunities
what we're going to see in a few years
from now using just local render
facilities is going to feel like using a
pay phone the demand that is coming down
the pike is going to far outpace any of
the local render facilities that we have
as well as others so i'm really looking
forward to untapping that issue and
having essentially infinite compute to
create these amazing film and tv
projects that we work on every single
day
[Music]
